column4: hi could someone help, im trying to update gutsy but it says "Could not download all repository indexes" and I get these errors. http://gb.archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/dists/gutsy/Release: Unable to find expected entry  web/binary-i386/Packages in Meta-index file (malformed Release file?)
